channel.title: BroBillionaire - Master The Markets
channel.description: Free comprehensive trading education - Learn stock market investing, options trading, futures strategies, forex, crypto, and technical analysis from legendary traders.

item.title: George Soros: The Man Who Broke the Bank of England
item.description: How George Soros made $1 billion in a single day by betting against the British Pound — the greatest currency trade in history.
item.dc:creator: BroBillionaire

item.title: Jim Simons: The Mathematician Who Cracked Wall Street
item.description: Inside Renaissance Technologies — the hedge fund that averaged 66% returns for decades using pure mathematics.
item.dc:creator: BroBillionaire

item.title: Paul Tudor Jones: Legendary Macro Trader
item.description: How Paul Tudor Jones predicted Black Monday and made billions from macro trading strategies.

item.title: Ray Dalio: Principles for Success in Trading
item.description: The founder of Bridgewater Associates shares his systematic approach to trading and risk management.
item.dc:creator: BroBillionaire

item.title: Jesse Livermore: The Greatest Trader Who Ever Lived
item.description: The story of the man who made and lost millions multiple times, and the timeless trading lessons from his career.
item.dc:creator: BroBillionaire

item.title: Black Monday 1987: The Day The World Stopped Trading
item.description: October 19, 1987 — The stock market lost 22.6% in a single day. $500 billion vanished. What caused the biggest crash in history?
item.dc:creator: BroBillionaire

item.title: The Flash Crash of 2010
item.description: In just 36 minutes, the Dow Jones dropped 1,000 points. How algorithmic trading caused market chaos.
item.dc:creator: BroBillionaire

item.title: LTCM: When Genius Failed
item.description: Long-Term Capital Management had Nobel Prize winners and the best minds on Wall Street. Then they nearly destroyed the global financial system.
item.dc:creator: BroBillionaire

item.title: GameStop Saga: How Reddit Took On Wall Street
item.description: The short squeeze that shook the financial world. How retail traders on Reddit caused hedge funds to lose billions.
item.dc:creator: BroBillionaire

item.title: How to Become a Profitable Trader
item.description: The complete roadmap to trading profitability - from beginner mistakes to consistent profits.

item.title: Trading Psychology: Master Your Mind
item.description: Why most traders fail and how to develop the mental edge that separates winners from losers.

item.title: Risk Management: The Key to Survival
item.description: Learn position sizing, stop losses, and the money management rules that professional traders live by.

item.title: Option Greeks Explained: Delta, Gamma, Theta, Vega
item.description: Master the Greeks that control option prices - the key to understanding how options really work.

item.title: Implied Volatility Explained
item.description: What is IV? How to use implied volatility to predict option prices and find trading opportunities.

item.title: Gamma Squeeze: How Dealers Create Explosions
item.description: Understanding the gamma squeeze phenomenon that creates explosive moves like GameStop.

item.title: Bank Nifty Trading: Best Time and Strategies
item.description: When to trade Bank Nifty options for maximum profits. The best time frames and strategies for Bank Nifty trading.

item.description: Understanding SEBI's margin requirements for F&O trading in India. Peak margin rules explained.
